NON MEMBER FUNCTION : Computes the cross product of two 3D vectors.

Computes the cross product of two 3D vectors.

Parameters:
_u : vector we want to compute the cross product with _v.
_v : vector we want to compute the cross product with _u.
Returns:
(Vector3D) Returns the result of the cross product of the two vectors given in parameter.
